lead_paragraph: A reader laments that the views of moderates in the G.O.P. are being overshadowed by the more extreme wing of the party. Readers are invited to respond.

headline.main: Invitation to a Dialogue: Quiet Moderate Republicans
headline.print_headline: Invitation to a Dialogue: Moderate Republicans

snippet: A reader laments that the views of moderates in the G.O.P. are being overshadowed by the more extreme wing of the party. Readers are invited to respond.
